title: Grateful Dead Live at Meadowlands Arena on 1984-10-17
source: flac16/48kHz; Source from Doug Oade: 90 degree, 17cm Schoeps CMC441s at Sbd into an Oade power supply > modified Sony TCD-D5M. Later, Sony TCD-D5M > DAW (via SEKD Prodif) > Wav16/48; Mastering by Dave Usborne: Izotpoe RX Advanced Declick and Spectral Repair used manually to fix pops and digital artifacts. Editing done in Reaper V4.591/X64; Tracks cut in Audacity 2.0.5; Flac files created in Traders Little Helper
